card.name: The Traveler
card.text: Modal spells you cast have entwine {X}, where X is the number of modes that spell has. (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast that spell. If you do, choose all of its modes.) Narrative — Whenever you cast a modal or split instant or sorcery spell, draw a card and put a +1/+1 counter on The Traveler.

card.name: Critical Decision
card.text: Choose one or more — • Destroy target enchantment. • Counter target spell. • Destroy target creature. • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target land.

card.name: Mount Elsewhere
card.text: Mount Elsewhere enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a vista counter on each of up to two target lands you control. They gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Thuul the Beastmaster
card.text: When Thuul the Beastmaster enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 green Beast creature tokens. At the beginning of your upkeep, choose 2/2 with flying, 3/3 with vigilance, or 4/4. Until end of turn, creature tokens you control have the chosen characteristics.

card.name: Hargau, Archlich
card.text: If a triggered ability of a creature you control would be triggered by that creature entering the battlefield, that ability also triggers when that creature dies. The same is also true in reverse.

card.name: True Chaos
card.text: Trample Whenever True Chaos deals combat damage to a player, that player chooses beginning phase, main phase, or combat phase. The player skips each instance of the chosen phase during their next turn. After this phase, there is an additional phase of the chosen type.

card.name: Skalathak, Deathless Wyrm
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Skalathak, Deathless Wyrm enters the battlefield or attacks, exile a card at random from target player's graveyard. Whenever Skalathak deals combat damage to a player, until end of turn, you may play a card exiled with Skalathak.

card.name: Morec, Lord of Nachtwood
card.text: Each noncreature artifact, enchantment, or land you control is a 1/1 Elf creature with haste in addition to its other types and abilities. Whenever Morec, Lord of Nachtwood attacks, attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Idol of Skalathak
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if mana of a color that spell isn't was spent to cast it, draw a card.

card.name: Hargau's Altar
card.text: Whenever another nontoken permanent enters the battlefield under your control or is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent mills two cards.

card.name: Iaxon's Gift
card.text: Equipped creature has double strike and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may have it make an experience check." (To make a successful experience check, exile a card from your graveyard with mana value greater than that creature's power to put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Equip {3}

card.name: Destiny's Horizon
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}: Draw a card. Spend only mana of three different colors to activate this ability.

card.name: Solemn Stonegazer
card.text: When Solemn Stonegazer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Solemn Stonegazer: Exile target permanent.

card.name: Put to the Sword // Put to the Test
card.text:
Put to the Sword deals 4 damage to any target. If excess damage is dealt this way, create a 2/2 green Beast creature token.
---
Target creature you control gets +X/+X and gains vigilance and trample until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Fabled Manor
card.text: ({T}: Add {W}.) As Fabled Manor enters the battlefield, you may reveal a white card from your hand that's two or more colors. If you don't, Fabled Manor enters tapped. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Astral Lich
card.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Foolhardy Venturer
card.text: {3}{G}{U}: Foolhardy Venturer gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Beastmaster's Guile
card.text: Choose one — • Create a 2/2 green Beast creature token. • Distribute two +1/+1 counters among creatures you control. Entwine {3} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Hand of Iaxon
card.text: Narrative — Whenever you cast a modal or split instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {G}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Hand of Iaxon.

card.name: Lich's Thrall
card.text: Flying When Lich's Thrall enters the battlefield, you may have it make an experience check. (Exile a card from your graveyard with mana value greater than this creature's power to put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Chaos Chieftain
card.text: Narrative — Whenever you cast a modal or split instant or sorcery spell, Chaos Chieftain gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Hargau's Vassal
card.text: When Hargau's Vassal enters the battlefield, you may have it make an experience check. (Exile a card from your graveyard with mana value greater than this creature's power to put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Hargau's Vassal has first strike as long as it's attacking.

card.name: Graceful Sunskimmer
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control. Flying

card.name: Child of the Beastmaster
card.text: Reach When Child of the Beastmaster enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control.

card.name: Survive the Tomb
card.text: Survive the Tomb deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Up to one target creature you control makes an experience check. (Exile a card from your graveyard with mana value greater than that creature's power to put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Trapped in the Citadel
card.text: When Trapped in the Citadel enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Beast creature token, then exile target nonland permanent you don't control until Trapped in the Citadel leaves the battlefield.

card.name: The Armor Walks
card.text: Choose one — • Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. • Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn. Entwine {GU} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Enter the Wretched Gate
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Divine Wrath // Divine Providence
card.text:
Destroy all nonland permanents.
---
Each player returns to the battlefield under their control each nonland permanent card in their graveyard with mana value X or less.

card.name: Ruthless Arbiter
card.text: Flying, vigilance As Ruthless Arbiter enters the battlefield, target opponent may put two +1/+1 counters on it. Noncreature spells with mana value less than Ruthless Arbiter's power can't be cast.

card.name: Seraph of Selection
card.text: Flying, lifelink Whenever you cast a modal spell, distribute X +1/+1 counters among creatures you control, where X is the number of times you chose a mode for that spell.

card.name: Beastmaster's Lieutenant
card.text: Whenever Beastmaster's Lieutenant attacks, choose up to one target green creature, up to one target white creature, and up to one target blue creature you control. Those creatures gain shielded until end of turn. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to them.)

card.name: Emissary of Thuul
card.text: Flying When Emissary of Thuul enters the battlefield, you may choose one — • Destroy target nonland permanent. • Return target nonland permanent card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Banish Scapegoat // Banish Doubts
card.text:
Exile target creature. Its controller may put a land card from their hand onto the battlefield tapped.
---
Your opponents can't cast spells this turn.

card.name: Manticore Keeper
card.text: Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. Manticore Keeper can't attack unless you control a creature with power 3 or greater.

card.name: Will of Thuul
card.text: Choose one — • You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. • Create a 2/2 white Drake creature token with flying. • Draw a card for each permanent that entered the battlefield under your control this turn. Entwine {GW}{WU} (Choose all if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.text: Double strike Whenever Nachtwood Blademaster becomes the target of a spell you control, you may have it make an experience check. (Exile a card from your graveyard with mana value greater than this creature's power to put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.text: Double strike Narrative — Whenever you cast a modal or split instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Moat Tyrant.

card.name: Master the Cycle
card.text: Choose one — • Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. • Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with power 3 or less from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card." Equip {3}

card.name: Try Again

There are additional beginning, main, combat, main, and ending phases after this phase.)

card.name: Draft Archetypes CYO
card.text: {G}{W}{U} MODAL Choose your destiny one modal spell at a time. {W}{U}{B} EXPERIENCE Split cards and graveyard-filling effects help build your creatures with experience checks. {U}{B}{R} ARTIFACTS Noncreature spells, foreshadowed creatures, and Manuscript pages all read victory. {B}{R}{G} FORESHADOW Threats are coming. Read ahead to learn more. {R}{G}{W} ENTWINE Your modal spells have extra options when you wait to entwine them. {W}{U} NARRATIVE Split cards and modal spells offer additional bonuses. {U}{B} EXPERIENCE Loot, surveil, and mill your way to experience checks. {B}{R} ARTIFACTS The spoils of adventure are yours to exploit. {R}{G} FORESHADOW Something looms in the distance. Control the game until your monsters make a dramatic arrival. {G}{W} SPLITS Narrative bonuses and experience checks benefit from your split cards.

When The Book of the Damned enters the battlefield, target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. {2} Vol. VI {T}: Add one mana of any color. {R}{G}{W} Vol. XIX {R}{G}{W}, {T}: Put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Rebuke the Tomb // Explore the Tomb
card.text:
Counter target spell.
---
Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."

card.name: Pondering Wizard
card.text: {3}, Sacrifice Pondering Wizard: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Hargau's Opus
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, Hargau's Opus gains your choice of first strike, vigilance, trample, or haste until end of turn.

card.name: The Rhyme of Ancient Kings
card.text: (Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) {1} Page 3 {T}: Target creature you control makes an experience check. (Exile a card from your graveyard with mana value greater than that creature's power to put a +1/+1 counter on it.) {2} Page 37 {2}, {T}, Exile a creature card form your graveyard: Draw a card.

card.name: In Defiance of Chaos
card.text: (Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.) Creatures you control have haste. {1}{R} Page 1 Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, it deals 1 damage to the player or permanent it's attacking. {3}{R} Page 2 Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, In Defiance of Chaos deals damage equal to that creature's power to target opponent. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Torch the Gates // Torch Everything
card.text:
Destroy target artifact.
---
Destroy target land.

card.name: Treasure CYO
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Shield of Day and Night
Conjure Self // Conjure Memories
card.text:
Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
---
Create a token that's a copy of target creature.

card.name: Hargau Archlich (bundle promo)
card.text: If a triggered ability of a creature you control would be triggered by that creature entering the battlefield, that ability also triggers when that creature dies. The same is also true in reverse.

card.name: Wyrm's Curse // Wyrm's Treasure
card.text:
Target player mills eight cards. Draw a card for each land card milled this way.
---
Target player exiles the top four cards of their library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards and mana of any type can be spent to cast them.

card.name: Hero's Wrath // Wyrm's Wrath
card.text:
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
---
Wyrm's Wrath deals damage to each creature and each planeswalker equal to the number of lands you control.

card.name: Ride to Glory // Ride to Ruin
card.text:
The owner of target nonland permanent shuffles it into their library.
---
Choose a card name. Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for up to four cards with that name and exile them. That player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

card.name: Divine Blessing // Divine Hubris
card.text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain hexproof until end of turn.
---
Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

card.name: Liber Maleficus
card.text: (Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.) When Liber Maleficus enters the battlefield, each opponent discards two cards. {B} Page ix At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, they lose 2 life. {3}{B} Page dclxvi At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, create a 0/0 black Shade creature token. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to four minus the number of cards in that player's hand.

card.name: In The Wyrm's Clutches
card.text: (Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.) When In The Wyrm's Clutches enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying. {1}{R} Page 117 Whenever a Dragon you control dies, it deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature, planeswalker, or battle. {2}{R} Page 279 Whenever one or more Dragons you control attack, In The Wyrm's Clutches deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

card.name: The Chronicles of Yor-Om
card.text: (Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.) Modal spells and split spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {9} Canto I When you choose this page and at the beginning of your upkeep, search target player's library for a card and exile it. That player shuffles. Copy the exiled card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. {9} Canto VI {5}{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}, Shuffle The Chronicles of Yor-Om into its owner's library: Target player loses the game.

card.name: Tale of the Lightstrider
card.text: (Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. {1}{G}{W} Page 8 At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card. {1}{W}{U} Page 29 Each creature you control with a counter on it can't be blocked.

card.name: To Face the Beast
card.text: (Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.) Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 3 life unless they sacrifice another creature. {U}{B} Page 3 At the beginning of combat on your turn, exile target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. {B}{R} Page 37 {T}: Any number of target players each create a tapped 1/1 red Spirit creature token.

card.name: In the Thrall of Death
card.text: (Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.) At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of target token you control. {W}{U} Page 13 Whenever you attack, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token that's tapped and attacking. {U}{B} Page 47 {X}{U}{B}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard with mana value X: Create a token that's a copy of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Tower of Skalathak
card.text: (Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.) Nonbasic lands lose all land types and abilities and have "{T}: Add {C}" and "{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color." {B}{R} Page 6 {3}{R}, {T}, Exile Tower of Skalathak: Destroy target land. Activate only as a sorcery. {R}{G} Page 13 {T}, Sacrifice Tower of Skalathak: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Into the Heart of Nachtwood
card.text: (Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.) When Into the Heart of Nachtwood enters the battlefield, for each kind of counter on target permanent, put another counter of that kind on it or remove one from it. {R}{G} Page 12 {T}, Remove a counter from an artifact or creature you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. {G}{W} Page 212 {T}, Remove three counters from among artifacts or creatures you control: Draw a card.
